books.title: The Glass Castle
books.description: A memoir by Jeannette Walls, detailing her unconventional and often harsh upbringing in a dysfunctional family.

books.title: The Other Side of the River
books.description: A gripping account of the lives of homeless people in America, exploring their struggles and resilience.

books.title: Rachel and Her Children: Homeless Families in America
books.description: A powerful and moving study of homeless families in America, focusing on the devastating impact of homelessness on children and their parents.
